TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_sm’atu, title = sm’atu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/sm’atu} }

S.FORM: sm'atu sm' atu hya ga maki squ ryax tngugan abaw. tehuk qu giqas kawas lga lama smrzyut ghap pinbahuw la. msli qu qutux bnkis, mblaq msbalay pqoyat tubux nha ghap. smxu heqil rngil nha pazih, imi nya ga teta buwazyun balay qu pinbahuw. pqsya' an nha qwaw trakis qu atu na qmayah ki qeqaya ptzyuwaw. imi nya ga teta maki l'uy kayal musa 'rkyas pinbahuw.

sm'ato sm' ato hya ga maki sqo ryax tngogan abaw. tehok qo giqas kawas lga lama smrzyot ghap pinbahow la. msli qo qotox bnkis, mblaq msbalay pqoyat tobox nha ghap. smxo heqil rngil nha pazih, imi nya ga teta bowazyon balay qo pinbahow. pqsya' an nha qwaw trakis qo ato na qmayah ki qeqaya ptzyowaw. imi nya ga teta maki l'oy kayal mosa 'rkyas pinbahow.
